title: Stone-Cold
description: When a hard-charging boss in Arizona is shot to death, police uncover a complex web of bruised egos in his professional life and a trail of broken hearts in his personal life. Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on January 4, 2019.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
